artist: Gaetano Guadagnini; Francesco Rosaspina; Orattio Sammucchini
description: top center Virgin seated on a cloud between Father and Son who hold crown above her head; dove above head; surrounded by angels and cherubs; below saints looking up; two soldiers(?) with swords looking out
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Orattio Sammucchini dip  F.Rosaspina dis  G. Guadagnini inc. / LA CORONAZIONE DE MARIA VERGINE / E LI S. NABORRE, FELICE, GIO BATTISTA, FRANCESCO, CHIARA, E. CATTERINA |  on sheet in pencil: 2-358
title: Coronation of the Virgin
